sentences.en: A 10% deposit is payable in advance.
A refundable deposit is payable on arrival.
sentences.cn: 可退还订金到店即可退还。

sentences.en: A returnable deposit is payable on arrival.
sentences.cn: 抵达时应支付可退还押金。

sentences.en: An initial fee is payable to the franchiser.
sentences.cn: 应该付给经销商一笔先期费用.

sentences.en: Cheques should be made payable to Country Living and your address written on the reverse.
sentences.cn: 支票抬头必须写“《乡村生活》杂志”，你的地址应写在背面。

sentences.en: Interest is payable on credit balances.
sentences.cn: 利息按照贷方余额支付。

sentences.en: It is a bill payable upon sight.
sentences.cn: 那是一张见票即付的汇票.

sentences.en: No tax is payable on these earnings.
Please enclose your remittance, making cheques payable to Thames Valley Technology.
sentences.cn: 请附上汇款，支票收款人为泰晤士河谷科技公司。

sentences.en: Purchase tax was not payable on goods for export.
sentences.cn: 出口商品不需要交购买税。

sentences.en: The full fee is payable on enrollment.
sentences.cn: 所有费用在注冊时缴付.

sentences.en: The money was payable by a draft drawn by the home.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱可凭国内承兑的汇票支付。

sentences.en: The rent is payable in advance .
This check is payable on demand.
sentences.cn: 这是一张见票即付的支票.

sentences.en: Write, enclosing a cheque made payable to Cobuild Limited.
sentences.cn: 写封信，附上一张支付给Cobuild有限公司的支票。

words.tran_cn: 付款，支付；报酬，报答；偿还；惩罚，报应
[会计]应付的；到期的；可付的；可获利的

trans.tran_cn: 应付的，可付的，可获利的
trans.tran_en: a bill, debt etc that is payable must be paid
